privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.content:
Jaydai Privacy Policy

1. Introduction

Welcome to Jaydai ("we," "our," or "us"). We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our Chrome extension.

2. Data We Collect

Jaydai collects and processes the following categories of personal data:

2.1 Account Information

  • üìßEmail address
  • üë§Name
  • üîëAuthentication tokens

2.2 User Activity Data

  • üí¨AI conversation patterns
  • üìäTemplate usage statistics
  • ‚ö°Energy consumption metrics
  • üìàEfficiency scores

2.3 User-Generated Content

  • üìùCustom templates created by users
  • üìÅFolder structures and organization preferences

2.4 Website Content

  • ü§ñContent from supported AI platforms necessary for providing template suggestions
  • üìëAI conversation content needed for analytics

3. How We Use Your Data

We use your personal data for the following purposes:

  • ‚öôÔ∏èTo provide and maintain our service
    Including user authentication, saving your preferences, and delivering core functionality
  • üîßTo improve our service
    Analyzing usage patterns to enhance features and performance
  • üéØTo personalize your experience
    Adapting to your communication style and offering suggestions based on your usage patterns
  • ‚úâÔ∏èTo communicate with you
    Sending notifications about updates or changes to our service

4. Data Storage and Security

  • üîíUser data is stored securely using industry-standard encryption
  • üíªWe process information locally whenever possible to minimize data transmission
  • üõ°Ô∏èAuthentication tokens are stored securely within Chrome's protected storage
  • üîêWe implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data

5. Data Sharing

We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal data to third parties. We may share your data in the following limited circumstances:

  • ü§ùWith service providers who help us deliver our services (such as cloud hosting providers)
  • ‚öñÔ∏èIf required by law or to respond to legal process
  • üõëTo protect our rights, privacy, safety, or property

6. Your Rights

Depending on your location, you may have the following rights regarding your personal data:

  • ??Ô∏èAccess your personal data
  • ‚úèÔ∏èCorrect inaccurate or incomplete data
  • üóëÔ∏èDelete your personal data
  • üõëRestrict or object to processing of your data
  • üì§Data portability
  • ‚Ü©Ô∏èWithdraw consent

To exercise these rights, please contact us at privacy@jayd.ai.

7. Retention

We retain your personal data only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law.

8. Children's Privacy

Our service is not directed to children under 16. We do not knowingly collect personal data from children under 16. If we learn we have collected personal data from a child under 16, we will delete that information.

9. Changes to This Policy

We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new privacy policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date.

10. Contact Us

If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us at:

üìßEmail: privacy@jayd.ai

üè¢Address: 123 Tech Boulevard, Innovation District, 94105, San Francisco, CA, USA

Jaydai Terms of Service

Welcome to Jaydai ("we," "our," or "us"). If you disagree with any part of these terms, please do not use our extension.
